verses.roman:
amṛtotpādane yatnaḥ
kriyatām avilambitam
yasya pītasya vai jantur
mṛtyu-grasto 'maro bhavet

synonyms: amṛta-utpādane—in generating nectar; yatnaḥ—endeavor; kriyatām—do; avilambitam—without delay; yasya—of which nectar; pītasya—anyone who drinks; vai—indeed; jantuḥ—living entity; mṛtyu-grastaḥ—although in imminent danger of death; amaraḥ—immortal; bhavet—can become.
translation: Immediately endeavor to produce nectar, which a person who is about to die may drink to become immortal.
